name: Fédération Internationale de l'Automobile
membership: Euro NCAP, ERTICO, AFCAR, Forum for Mobility & Society, Mobility for Prosperity in Europe, UNECE (observer) UNECE World Tourism Organisation, ITF, Mobility as a Service Alliance.
goal:
Among FIA's primary goals are to uphold the interests of its membership in all international matters concerning automobile mobility and motor sport and to preserve and conserve all documents concerning world motoring in order to trace its history.
In the area of mobility, the FIA's goal is to ensure safe, affordable, clean and efficient mobility for all.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Intelligent Transport Systems, connected and automated driving, Digital Single Market, vehicle emissions, road charging, road safety policies, motor insurance, odometer manipulation, access to in-vehicle data, urban vehicle access restrictions.
